channel.title: Layout_configurations on Fluid Player Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Layout_configurations on Fluid Player Documentation

item.title: Layout Configuration
item.description: There are optional parameters that can be used to customise the Fluid Player. None of the options are required but can be tailored to better suit your own design. Layout controls relate to the functionality and styling of the player itself. The full list of layoutControls are below: fluidPlayer( 'my-video', { layoutControls: { primaryColor: false, playButtonShowing: true, playPauseAnimation: true, fillToContainer: false, autoPlay: false, preload: false, mute: false, keyboardControl: true, layout: 'default', allowDownload: false, playbackRateEnabled: false, allowTheatre: true, title: false, logo: { imageUrl: null, position: 'top left', clickUrl: null, opacity: 1 }, controlBar: { autoHide: true, autoHideTimeout: 3, animated: true }, timelinePreview: {}, htmlOnPauseBlock: { html: null, height: null, width: null }, playerInitCallback: (function() {}) } } ); primaryColor Primary color affects the following areas of the Fluid Player:
